links: Harry J. Smith, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..20000
Index entries for continued fractions for constants
prog: (PARI) contfrac(Pi^exp(1))(PARI) { allocatemem(932245000); default(realprecision, 21000); x=contfrac(Pi^exp(1)); for (n=0, 20000, write("b058288.txt", n, " ", x[n+1])); } \\ _Harry J. Smith_, Apr 19 2009
author: _Robert G. Wilson v_, Dec 07 2000
